activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The instructor  usually cleans the heating c'oi'ls himself.
Do not b'oi'l the coolant to test the pressure.
This lathe machine is always very n'oi'sy.
Always tighten the pipe j'oi'nt carefully.

activity_2.focus: Focus Simple Present, frequency adverbs, pronouns (it, them)

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_a: How often do you polish your bicycle?
How often do your parents visit their relatives?
How often do you practise the guitar?
example_dialogues.text_b: We practise it once a week.

dialogues.text_a: How often do you measure components with the vernier caliper?
How often do you lubricate the lathe bed?
How often do you wipe the machine surfaces?
How often do you sharpen the cutting blades?
How often do you call your mother?
dialogues.text_b: I call her once a day.

dialogues.text_a: How often do you replace worn-out bearings?
dialogues.text_b: We replace them twice a year.

activity_a.text:
Answer the following  questions about yourself. 
ඔබ ගැන පහත ප්‍රශ්නවලට පිළිතුරු දෙන්න.
தயவுசெய்து கீழே உள்ள கேள்விகளுக்கு உங்களுக்கான பதில்களை அளியுங்கள்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

content.sentence: How often do you revise your workshop notes after class?
options: I revise them more than once a week.
I revise them once a week.
I revise them less than once a week.

content.sentence: How often do you assist your instructor with setting up practical equipment?
options: I assist him more than once a week.
I assist him once a week.
I assist him less than once a week.

content.sentence: How often do you participate in community service activities?
options: I participate in them more than once a month.
I participate in them once a month.
I participate in them less than once a month.

content.sentence: How often do you inspect household electrical items at home?
options: I inspect them more than once a week.
I inspect them once a week.
I inspect them less than once a week.

content.sentence: How often do you update your training logbook?
options: I update it more than once a month.
I update it once a month.
I update it less than once a month.

content.sentence: How often do you visit your relatives in another town?
options: I visit them more than twice a year.
I visit them twice a year.
I visit them less than twice a year.

content.sentence: How often do you attend technical exhibitions or career fairs?
options: I attend them more than once a year.
I attend them once a year.
I attend them less than once a year.

content.sentence: How often do you review safety procedures with your classmates?
options: I review them more than twice a week.
I review them twice a week.
I review them less than twice a week.

content.sentence: How often do you clean tools and equipment in the lab?
options: I clean them more than once a week.
I clean them once a week.
I clean them less than once a week.

content.sentence: How often do you participate in sports or fitness activities at your institute?
options: I participate in them more than twice a month.
I participate in them twice a month.
I participate in them less than twice a month.

How often do you assist your instructor with setting up practical equipment?
How often do you participate in community service activities?
How often do you inspect household electrical items at home?
How often do you update your training logbook?
How often do you visit your relatives in another town?
How often do you attend technical exhibitions or career fairs?
How often do you review safety procedures with your classmates?
How often do you clean tools and equipment in the lab?
How often do you participate in sports or fitness activities at your institute?

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_b.text:
You will hear each recording twice. Listen and mark who says the following sentences.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. පහත වාක්‍ය කියන්නේ කව්දැයි සලකුණු කරන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கீழே உள்ள வாக்கியங்களை யார் கூறுகிறார்கள் என்பதை கேட்டு குறியிடுங்கள்.

activity_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_e.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: Why did the customer visit the shop?
options: To buy a new grinder
To return a faulty grinder
To ask about grinder accessories

Questions.question: What problem does the customer mention first?
Questions.answer: The motor makes a strange noise
options: The jar is cracked
The motor makes a strange noise
The motor gives off burning smell

Questions.question: How does the customer usually use the grinder?
Questions.answer: He starts on low speed and moves to medium
options: He starts on low speed and moves to medium
He always uses the highest speed
He never changes the speed

Questions.question: What does the shop assistant say about the warranty?
Questions.answer: It is still valid and the grinder can be repaired or replaced
options: It has already expired
It is still valid and the grinder can be repaired or replaced
The customer must buy a new one

Questions.question: What does the customer prefer at the end of the conversation?
options: To wait for the repair
To get a replacement grinder
To take the old grinder back home

activity_c.text: I bought this food grinder from your shop last month, but it’s not working properly.
Could you please tell me what seems to be the problem?
I always clean the grinder properly after use, so I don’t think it’s because of dirt or leftover food. (Always – 100%)
Well, the grinder usually works fine for the first few minutes, but then the motor makes a strange noise. (Usually – about 90%)
I often have to open the lid and push the ingredients down with a spoon. (Often – about 75–85%)
It sometimes even gives off a burning smell. (Sometimes – about 50%)
I rarely use the highest speed. (Rarely – about 10%)
Does the blade still rotate smoothly?
Did you notice any cracks in the jar or rubber seal?
Please fill out this return form. We’ll check the fault and issue a replacement once confirmed.
Would you like a replacement or a repair?
If possible, I’d prefer a replacement. I use it almost every day for my cooking.

activity_d.text: I bought this food grinder from your shop last month, but it’s not working properly.
Could you please tell me what seems to be the problem?
I always clean the grinder properly after use, so I don’t think it’s because of dirt or leftover food. (Always – 100%)
Well, the grinder usually works fine for the first few minutes, but then the motor makes a strange noise. (Usually – about 90%)
I often have to open the lid and push the ingredients down with a spoon. (Often – about 75–85%)
It sometimes even gives off a burning smell. (Sometimes – about 50%)
I rarely use the highest speed. (Rarely – about 10%)
Does the blade still rotate smoothly?
Did you notice any cracks in the jar or rubber seal?
Please fill out this return form. We’ll check the fault and issue a replacement once confirmed.
Would you like a replacement or a repair?
If possible, I’d prefer a replacement. I use it almost every day for my cooking.

instrction_a.text:
Watch this video to help you better understand today’s lesson.
අද පාඩම හොඳින් අවබෝධ කර ගැනීමට මෙම වීඩියෝව බලන්න.
இன்றைய பாடத்தை நன்றாக புரிந்துகொள்ள இந்த வீடியோவைப் பாருங்கள்.

instruction_b.text:
These steps will help you to learn English from this video.
මෙම පියවරන් ඔබට මෙම වීඩියෝවෙන් ඉංග්‍රීසි ඉගෙන ගැනීමට උදව් කරනු ඇත.
இந்த வீடியோவிலிருந்து ஆங்கிலம் கற்க இந்த படிகள் உங்களுக்கு உதவும்.
steps:
Watch the video 2 times.
වීඩියෝව වර දෙකක් බලන්න.
வீடியோவை இரண்டு முறைப் பாருங்கள்.

Explain any new words using Google Translator.
Google පරිවර්තකය භාවිතයෙන් නව වචන කිහිපයක් විස්තර කරන්න.
Google மொழிபெயர்ப்பாளரைப் பயன்படுத்தி சில புதிய வார்த்தைகளை விளக்குங்கள்.

Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.
